Citrus_Canker_Diseases_Leaf_Orange.solution: Spray copper oxychloride 0.3% or streptocycline 100 ppm at 10–15 day intervals.
Citrus_Canker_Diseases_Leaf_Orange.organic: Apply neem oil 3% or garlic extract spray every 15 days.

Citrus_Nutrient_Deficiency_Yellow_Leaf_O.solution: Apply foliar spray of zinc sulfate 0.5% and ferrous sulfate 0.5% once every 20 days.
Citrus_Nutrient_Deficiency_Yellow_Leaf_O.organic: Use compost and banana peel solution for natural micronutrient enrichment.

Corn_Blight.solution: Use Mancozeb 75% WP at 2.5 g/L or Azoxystrobin 250 g/L at 0.5 L/ha during early infection.
Corn_Blight.organic: Spray neem oil 2% or use garlic-chili extract as preventive measure.

Corn_Common_Rust.solution: Apply Propiconazole 25% EC 1 mL/L at first rust pustule appearance.
Corn_Common_Rust.organic: Spray sulphur dust or neem seed kernel extract (NSKE 5%) for rust suppression.

Corn_grey_leaf_spot.solution: Spray Tebuconazole 250 g/L at 0.5 L/ha at early lesion stage.
Corn_grey_leaf_spot.organic: Use compost tea extract and maintain crop spacing for better air flow.

Grape_Black_Rot.solution: Spray Mancozeb 2.5 g/L or Captan 0.2% at 10-day intervals during humid weather.
Grape_Black_Rot.organic: Use neem oil 3% or apply Trichoderma-enriched compost around vines.

Grape_ESCA.solution: Apply Carbendazim 50% WP at 1 g/L; prune infected canes immediately.
Grape_ESCA.organic: Apply Trichoderma viride paste to pruning wounds for natural disease suppression.

Grape_Leaf_Blight.solution: Spray Chlorothalonil 2 g/L or Copper oxychloride 0.3% twice at 10-day intervals.
Grape_Leaf_Blight.organic: Use neem oil 3% or turmeric water extract for natural protection.

Multiple_Diseases_Leaf_Orange.solution: Use Mancozeb 0.25% and copper oxychloride 0.3% alternately at 15-day intervals.
Multiple_Diseases_Leaf_Orange.organic: Spray neem oil 2% or fermented buttermilk solution for disease reduction.

Pepper__bell___Bacterial_spot.solution: Use copper-based sprays or kasugamycin formulations once every 10 days.
Pepper__bell___Bacterial_spot.organic: Apply neem oil or garlic extract for bacterial suppression.

Potato___Early_blight.solution: Use Chlorothalonil 720 WG 0.75 kg/ha or Mancozeb 2.5 g/L every 10–12 days.
Potato___Early_blight.organic: Spray compost tea or neem oil 3% for fungal control.

Potato___Late_blight.solution: Spray Metalaxyl 8% + Mancozeb 64% WP at 2 g/L when symptoms appear.
Potato___Late_blight.organic: Use garlic extract spray and maintain dry leaves to prevent spread.
